plot: When two young brothers Flaco and Lino realize their Mamita is dying, they embark on an unsupervised journey throughout Los Angeles in search of a special sandwich. What they find is magical.
title: Philippe's Sandwich
plot_es: When two young brothers Flaco and Lino realize their Mamita is dying, they embark on an unsupervised journey throughout Los Angeles in search of a special sandwich. What they find is magical.
plot_en: When two young brothers Flaco and Lino realize their Mamita is dying, they embark on an unsupervised journey throughout Los Angeles in search of a special sandwich. What they find is magical.
